Posts.Title: Losing Appitite

Posts.Content: hi Every one there, I am here on behalf of my mother. She is 75 yrs had a lapse of cancer which has spread to pleural fluid after 15 years of successful treatment 8 chemo and 45 days of radiotherapy. She had again 8 chemo followed by herseptin therapy. After third cycle of herseptin her condition detorated and it was stopped. It has affected her heart functioning to 30%. Presently she is on : 1) Tykerb 250mg - 4 tab per day 2) Femara 2.5mg - 1 tab per day 3) Lanoxin .25mg and Lasix 40mg alternative day 4) Ivabrid 5mg per day She lost her appetite and does not like to eat. She take one bowl of rice, dal, veg and a bowl of milk and sometime one wheat bread. While having meal some time she could not swallow food after chewing and come out though we give vomiting medicine half and hour before each meal. She likes fruits and have any one available at home per day. Will appreciate if someone out there is on above drugs and suggest how her appetite can be improve while controlling her vomiting. Thank you

Posts.Content: Hi Sorry to hear that. I am here on this site on behalf of my mother. My mother had undergone through the stage. One fine day after third cycle of herceptin he was admitted in emergency with shorting in breathing and uneasy ness. Hospital did eco and found that it her heart functioning was reduced to 15%. Final herceptin was stopped after third cycle and before that she already had 8 chemos. It was purely laspse from indian onocologist that she did not even borther to do eco after each cycle of chemo and herceptin though she was 100% aware of the fact that chemo and herceptin drugs do effect the function of heart. Please see the possibilties of doing eco after each cycle to know the health of our heart as it is very critical organ. Becz now additionally my mother is on heart drugs as well . Regards
